verses.verse: And <WG2532> there came <WG2064> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> that had <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> bowls <WG5357>, and <WG2532> spake <WG2980> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>, saying <WG3004>, <WG3427> Come hither <WG1204>, I will show <WG1166> thee <WG4671> the judgment <WG2917> of the great <WG3173> harlot <WG4204> that sitteth <WG2521> upon <WG1909> many <WG4183> waters <WG5204>;

with <WG3326> whom <WG3739> the kings <WG935> of the earth <WG1093> committed fornication <WG4203>, and <WG2532> they that dwell <WG2730> in the earth <WG1093> were made drunken <WG3184> with <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of her <WG846> fornication <WG4202>.

And <WG2532> he carried <WG667> me <WG3165> away in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> a wilderness <WG2048>: and <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> a woman <WG1135> sitting <WG2521> upon <WG1909> a scarlet-colored <WG2847> beast <WG2342>, full <WG1073> of names <WG3686> of blasphemy <WG988>, having <WG2192> seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> and <WG2532> ten <WG1176> horns <WG2768>.

And <WG2532> the woman <WG1135> was arrayed <WG4016> in purple <WG4209> and <WG2532> scarlet <WG2847>, and <WG2532> decked <WG5558> with gold <WG5557> and <WG2532> precious <WG5093> stone <WG3037> and <WG2532> pearls <WG3135>, having <WG2192> in <WG1722> her <WG846> hand <WG5495> a golden <WG5552> cup <WG4221> full <WG1073> of abominations <WG946>, even <WG2532> the unclean <WG168> things of her <WG846> fornication <WG4202>,

and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> her <WG846> forehead <WG3359> a name <WG3686> written <WG1125>, MYSTERY <WG3466>, BABYLON <WG897> THE GREAT <WG3173>, THE MOTHER <WG3384> OF THE HARLOTS <WG4204> AND <WG2532> OF THE ABOMINATIONS <WG946> OF THE EARTH <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> the woman <WG1135> drunken <WG3184> with <WG1537> the blood <WG129> of the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> the blood <WG129> of the martyrs <WG3144> of Jesus <WG2424>. And <WG2532> when I saw <WG1492> her <WG846>, I wondered <WG2296> with a great <WG3173> wonder <WG2295>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> said unto <WG2036> me <WG3427>, Wherefore <WG1223> didst thou wonder <WG2296>? I <WG1473> will tell <WG2046> thee <WG4671> the mystery <WG3466> of the woman <WG1135>, and <WG2532> of the beast <WG2342> that carrieth <WG941> her <WG846>, which <WG5101> hath <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> and <WG2532> the ten <WG1176> horns <WG2768>.

The beast <WG2342> that <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> was <WG2258>, and <WG2532> is <WG2076> not <WG3756>; and <WG2532> is <WG3195> about to come <WG305> up out of <WG1537> the abyss <WG12>, and <WG2532> to go <WG5217> into <WG1519> perdition <WG684>. And <WG2532> they that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> shall wonder <WG2296>, they whose <WG3739> name <WG3686> hath <WG1125> not <WG3756> been written <WG1125> in <WG1909> the book <WG975> of life <WG2222> from <WG575> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>, when they behold <WG991> the beast <WG2342>, how that he was <WG3748>, and <WG2532> is <WG2076> not <WG3756>, and shall <WG2539> come <WG2076>.

Here <WG5602> is the mind <WG3563> that hath <WG2192> wisdom <WG4678>. The seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> are <WG1526> seven <WG2033> mountains <WG3699>, on <WG1909> which <WG846> the woman <WG1135> sitteth <WG2521>:

and <WG2532> they are <WG1526> seven <WG2033> kings <WG935>; the five <WG4002> are fallen <WG4098>, the <WG2532> one <WG1520> is <WG2076>, the other <WG243> is not yet <WG3768> come <WG2064>; and <WG2532> when <WG3752> he <WG846> cometh <WG2064>, he must <WG1163> continue <WG3306> a little while <WG3641>.

And <WG2532> the beast <WG2342> that <WG3739> was <WG2258>, and <WG2532> is <WG2076> not <WG3756>, is <WG2076> himself <WG846> also <WG2532> an eighth <WG3590>, and <WG2532> is <WG2076> of <WG1537> the seven <WG2033>; and <WG2532> he goeth <WG5217> into <WG1519> perdition <WG684>.

And <WG2532> the ten <WG1176> horns <WG2768> that <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> are <WG1526> ten <WG1176> kings <WG935>, who <WG3748> have received <WG2983> no <WG3768> kingdom <WG932> as yet <WG3768>; but <WG235> they receive <WG2983> authority <WG1849> as <WG5613> kings <WG935>, with <WG3326> the beast <WG2342>, for one <WG1520> hour <WG5610>.
These <WG3778> have <WG2192> one <WG1520> mind <WG1106>, and <WG2532> they give <WG1239> their <WG1438> power <WG1411> and <WG2532> authority <WG1849> unto the beast <WG2342>.

These <WG3778> shall war <WG4170> against <WG3326> the Lamb <WG721>, and <WG2532> the Lamb <WG721> shall overcome <WG3528> them <WG846>, for <WG3754> he is <WG2076> Lord <WG2962> of lords <WG2962>, and <WG2532> King <WG935> of kings <WG935>; and <WG2532> they also shall overcome that are <WG3588> with <WG3326> him <WG846>, called <WG2822> and <WG2532> chosen <WG1588> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103>.

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto me <WG3427>, The waters <WG5204> which <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492>, where <WG3757> the harlot <WG4204> sitteth <WG2521>, are <WG1526> peoples <WG2992>, and <WG2532> multitudes <WG3793>, and <WG2532> nations <WG1484>, and <WG2532> tongues <WG1100>.

And <WG2532> the ten <WG1176> horns <WG2768> which <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492>, and <WG2532> the beast <WG2342>, these <WG3778> shall hate <WG3404> the harlot <WG4204>, and <WG2532> shall make <WG4160> her <WG846> desolate <WG2049> and <WG2532> naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> shall eat <WG5315> her <WG846> flesh <WG4561>, and <WG2532> shall burn <WG2618> her <WG846> utterly with <WG1722> fire <WG4442>.

For <WG1063> God <WG2316> did put <WG1325> in <WG1519> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588> to do <WG4160> his <WG846> mind <WG1106>, and <WG2532> to come to one <WG1520> mind <WG1106>, and <WG2532> to give <WG1325> their <WG846> kingdom <WG932> unto the beast <WG2342>, until <WG891> the words <WG4487> of God <WG2316> should be accomplished <WG5055>.
And <WG2532> the woman <WG1135> whom <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> is <WG2076> the great <WG3173> city <WG4172>, which <WG2192> reigneth <WG932> over <WG1909> the kings <WG935> of the earth <WG1093>.
